txt.en: 'I am eager to learn more from you, [placeholder]. I know it will not come easily, but I will become a shield-maiden, no matter the cost.\n\n'I am fortunate to have met someone with the same determination and will to do good that I see in myself... and in my father.'
'I hear the faint roar of fighting coming from the training grounds. We had better investigate with haste.'
Instance: Desire Above Strength

'Edwulf has been wounded! It is not a fatal blow, but he will need someone to protect him.\n\n'This must be the work of the Uruks, [placeholder]! No doubt they are assailing the training grounds. Go and assail the Uruk-intruders, while I stay and watch over Edwulf.'
'Edwulf, no! This is horrible.'
'We must allow time for the men to recover and restore the camp.\n\n'Once again, I am honoured to be your student.'
The sounds of combat can be heard to the south
'A timely return, [placeholder]. A large Uruk approaches!'
The grunts of Uruks can be heard coming from the training grounds
'Can you fight better than you hide? Prepare to fall, like the rest!'
Defeated the Uruk-hai at the training grounds ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Ides can be found at the mill, north of the training grounds.\n\nIdes wishes to discuss her thoughts with you.
'With enough training, I hope to be able to rally and inspire others in the way that my father can.'
The Uruk-hai have been routed
Talk to Ides along the roadway
'My strong will and determination are traits passed down from my father.'
Ides can be found at the mill, north of the training grounds.\n\nIdes seems to have heard a noise and wishes to inquire about it.
Ides has been defeated
'Father loves all of his daughters dearly, and he has supported my dreams of becoming a shield-maiden.'
Ides can be found at the forked path along the road, west of the training grounds.\n\nIdes has found Edwulf, injured in battle, and would like to discuss what should be done.
'Yet his greatest desire is to sire a son, an heir to groom to take his seat when he should pass.'
Uruks have assaulted the Rohirrim training grounds.\n\nIdes has asked you to help deal with the attacking Uruk-hai.
'When Mother passed away, Father was devastated... but he never abandoned his desire for a son.'
Ides can be found along the road, west of the training grounds.\n\nAfter defeating the Uruk-hai invaders, Ides awaits your return.
'He has sought the hand of a new bride, courting the widow Thane Mildreth of Elthengels, without sucess.'
Ides can be found along the road, west of the training grounds.\n\nIdes has spotted an Uruk, and will need your help to defeat it.
'His strong determination will not allow him to fail. He will pursue a new wife with dignity and purpose.'
Ides can be found along the road, west of the training grounds.\n\nAfter defeating the Uruk-hai invaders, Ides awaits your return.
'I am confident that he will succeed in the end, and he will have his son, at any cost.'
'Oh! Can you hear something?'
'Hurry, we must be prepared.'
Listen to Ides share her thoughts
Talk to Ides
Follow Ides to investigate
Talk to Ides
Talk to Ides about Edwulf
Defeat the Uruk-hai at the training grounds ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Ides along the road
Defeat the Uruk-hai warrior
Do not allow Ides to become defeated
Ides has asked you to walk with her and to listen as she expresses her thoughts.

'We have defeated the invaders! It is most fortunate that we were nearby... Edwulf's wounds are not fatal, and the damage to the camp will be quickly repaired.\n\n'These men owe us their lives, [placeholder]. We arrived just in time.'
